Sylphia Island is a visual novel built in Ren'Py.  You play as your own named MC as you explore the mystery of the island and try to discover what twist of fates  led you to losing your memory. In your adventures you'll stay with : 

 • Alex - A matriarchal figure who cares for girls who all have their own fate and story that led to them staying under her roof. 

 • Gracie - A rambunctious and energetic girl who has a love for nature 

 • Celeste - A die hard tsundere with a smirk that'll melt steel 

 • Lillian - A lazy gamer girl who isn't afraid to tell people exactly what she thinks

 • Serra - A extremely shy but caring girl who has a knack for helping others 

 You'll forge your own path, with no guidelines or rules. Focus on what girl(s) you want, and ignore who you don't. Make friends, enemies,  and discover the mysteries of why you ended up on Sylphia Island, just don't forget to have a little bit of fun along the way.
